item.title: Pip: Minimal Two-Dimensional Chess Piece Set
item.description: This article explores a concept for minimal, two-dimensional chess pieces for use in digital environments. I wanted to create a functional approach, in which the design of each piece represents its capabilities instead of its name. Similar in appearance to the faces of dice, the arrangement of pips reflects each piece’s legal movement pattern.
